title: Analysis of Factors Influencing Learning Outcomes in Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Customized design for digital device-enabled environments, language curriculum domains, and working professionals

learning_goals: Learners will explain key factors (age, learning strategies, lecture responsiveness, etc.) influencing learning outcomes in remote education.
Learners will build a predictive model for learning outcomes by analyzing survey data.
Learners will develop an action plan to improve their learning strategies based on analytical results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
